Summary: [REG 4.6.2=>4.9.2] Code completion in cmake project not working on Windows
Description:
I cannot provide the whole project (it is big and not open source), but on Windows the code completion completely fails in a larger cmake project. 

Nothing happens in any of the files even in basic classes. It also does not work if the code is plainly written in the top of a file.
 !image-2019-08-22-10-55-08-353.png|thumbnail! 
 !image-2019-08-22-10-57-37-067.png|thumbnail! 

The code completes on Mac. It may be a settings issue, but removing the QtCreator ini-file didn't help. (I have not tried to remove settings on Mac).
Creator: Thorbjørn Lund Martsum
